com.google.appinventor.components.runtime

Class VisibleComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.VisibleComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AndroidViewComponent, Sprite

    public abstract class VisibleComponent
extends Object
implements Component
    Superclass of visible components in the runtime libraries.

    Defines standard properties and events.
